title: Club Name
body:
Kia ora, Greetings

 I tried to do a bit of research to see what was wrong and everything but I couldn't find a souloution so pretty much I cant show my tag for my club tried multiple times changing clubs and everything but to my fail im here

Any help plox{{item:3748}} 


Yours Truly

TitoNZL

contact@titonz.com

replies.body: @Sephiroth I just reinstalled and it worked ty! {{champion:36}}

Hey there,

That's pretty weird, there's a few things I'd like you to try/answer.

* [Run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)
* Ensure "Display club tags" is checked (http://puu.sh/pEnKg/de2baee34d.jpg)
  * Toggle the setting off and on
* Are your other club members experiencing the same issue?
